channel.title: READ PLZ - How to make everyone who logs onto my server, mods?
channel.description:
How do I make everyone who logs onto the server, mods? I would love to make a server with everyone who was mods! So, how do I do it? It would take too long to make everyone mods manually? Anyone who answers this right gets a free admin on the server lotsofcodesscape.no-ip.org!
Thanks, Blade Server

item.title: READ PLZ - How to make everyone who logs onto my server, mods?
item.dc:creator: @F00L_I_K0 F00L I K0
item.description:
@F00L_I_K0 wrote:

X-J-K-X:

-.-… Someone correct me if im wrong? But did he just advertise?.. I dont know whats got into you noobs now, your always announcing your server, and its probably a downloaded source… And you give no credits to the person who makes it… 100% credit to you? I dont think so… Ahh i can’t stop you, but i am gonna say, stop… Please

Spam much?

Also to make everybody mod search in Player.java for

		playerRights = 0; //player rights

Then change the 0 to 1

Read full topic

item.title: READ PLZ - How to make everyone who logs onto my server, mods?
item.dc:creator: @Blade_Server Blade Server
item.description:
@Blade_Server wrote:

Hey, are you talking about my signature? I think your getting the signature mixed up with the post? And the reason I made this topic was because I needed answers, so please don’t… This is your correction…And, I’m not a noob…I’m not doing anything against the rules…[br][size=1]Posted on: September 06, 2007, 11:07:08 AM[/size][hr]Post CLOSED! Thanks, I found out how to!

Blade Server

Read full topic
